name: Bea-Mail's Express Shipping
description:
Deliver the mail through saw-blades and spikes. Made to practice the Godot engine.Couldn't figure out saving so your best-time reset when reloading the page.

Controls:

Arrow Keys/D-Pad or Control Stick - Move

Space/A or B (XBox) - Jump
